directions: Combine garlic scapes, basil, parsley, Parmesan cheese, scallion bulb, salt, and black pepper in a food processor; pulse to chop. Pour olive oil in slowly, with the processor running, until pesto sauce is smooth.
ingredients: 1 cup fresh basil leaves, or more to taste
1 scallion bulb, trimmed, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Pesto Pesto Sauce (Nut Free or Dairy Free)
